Logistic regression is a supervised learning classification algorithm used to predict the probability of a target variable. It is one of the simplest ML algorithms that can be used for various classification problems such as spam detection, Diabetes prediction, cancer detection etc.There can be two more categories of target variables that can be predicted in some cases. Based on those number of categories, Logistic regression can be divided into following types −
* Binary - The target variable will have only two possible types either 1 and 0.
* Multinomial - The dependent variable can have 3 or more possible unordered categories.
